description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ih78","text":"This protocol describes the regular maintenance and passaging human iPSCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"15m5f","text":"Reagents required","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dou10","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7c02k","text":"E8 Media (Gibco)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92tt","text":"0.5M EDTA (Gibco), working solution 0.5mM EDTA prepared in sterile PBS solution","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t7v7","text":"Y-27632 Rock inhibitor (Tocris Bioscience)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b25dv","text":"Matrigel (corning)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7retu","text":"Remove Matrigel matrix and dispense appropriate number of cells onto Matrigel coated dishes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 2
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"237cr","text":"Feed every day with fresh media till plate gets 60-70% confluency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
